thread.title: Mercedes launches AMG C 63 S priced at Rs 1.3 crore
thread.title_full: Mercedes launches AMG C 63 S priced at Rs 1.3 crore | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Mercedes launches AMG C 63 S priced at Rs 1.3 crore
text:
Other Articles Honda launches 'Celebration Edition' of Amaze, Mobilio Expect minority shareholders' voting on Gujarat plant soon: Maruti Volkswagen's finance chief Hans Dieter Poetsch set to become new chairman German luxury car maker Mercedes-Benz on Thursday launched AMG C 63 S in New Delhi in the performance car segment priced at Rs 1.3 crore (ex-showroom Delhi).
C 63 S is the 10th model launched by Mercedes-Benz in India in the AMG class and is a car with intelligent assistance systems powered by a 4.0-litre V8 bi-turbo engine.
The sports car consumes 32 per cent less fuel compared with its predecessors and hurtles to 100 km/ph in four seconds, Mercedes-Benz India said in a statement.
Mercedes-Benz India MD & CEO Eberhard Kern said: “The C 63 AMG has been a legendary sports car, and with the launch of the new generation AMG C 63 S, the success story of the Mercedes-AMG brand will be further rooted in India.”
He hoped that AMG C 63 S will play a key role in strengthening Mercedes-Benz’s strong presence in the performance car segment.
“This is the 10th AMG model we are introducing as there is an increasing demand for our high-end performance cars. The launch of the AMG C 63 S further reiterates our ‘top of the pyramid’ product strategy which highlights our endeavour in offering the best products from our global portfolio for our Indian customers,” Kern added.
 03, 2015 4:24 pm
